About.title: About me
About.content: Hi! I’m Daniel, a software developer currently working in "Digital Transformation", where <bold>I build internal tools and provide technical support to users at Andean.</bold>
About.content2: I entered the IT world almost by accident. My original plan was to study psychology, but I ended up surprising myself by genuinely enjoying building applications from scratch and turning ideas into something real—even staying up late to fix a bug.
About.content3: I’m particularly interested in growing as a <bold>backend developer</bold>. I’m highly motivated by learning new things and tackling challenges that push my knowledge further. Every time I learn something new and dig a bit deeper, I realize how vast this field is—it can be overwhelming, but I feel that’s part of the charm. <bold>The constant change and growth are what make this career exciting and rewarding.</bold>
About.content4: Outside of work, I’m calm, thoughtful, and quick to laugh. I enjoy those rare coincidences life puts in my path. <bold>I like listening to people, understanding how they think, and finding that human spark that makes conversations truly meaningful.</bold>
